  • Referrals

Referrals¶

Ourzobia PHP is a referral driven system that rewards users by their community efforts, the referrals section contains a comprehensive list of all users referred by the logged in user and their direct descendants. This means, everyone directly or indirectly associated or linked to the logged user can be seen under referrals.
